name: Ribbit Channel (DeadHarlequin)
description:
Ribbit Channel is a short interactive cartoon. Graphics is done entirely in claymation, and the game itself is filled with color and warmth. The bright plasticine world could motivate anyone to sculpt from modelling clay, and perhaps remind you of your childhood. Ribbit Channel will make you happier and cheer you up on a rainy day.

Plot

The toad detective airs the first episode of his own TV-show. The investigation is broadcasted live. You will help to find the missing museum exhibit.

Credits

Lisa Markova(@DeadHarlequin) - programming, art, game design, music, sfx

Andrew Orlov(@noiselassie) - testing
